body.p: The authors are grateful to Dr Wang for his astute observations in pointing out typographical errors in the labeling of the scattergram tool used in the new standardized format for reporting hearing outcomes in clinical trials.1 A revised scattergram is being created and will be uploaded to the journal’s website when it is available.
